law.text:
Except as otherwise authorized by law, all state contracts shall be awarded by:
Competitive sealed bidding, pursuant to KRS 45A.080; or
Competitive negotiation, pursuant to KRS 45A.085 and 45A.090 or 45A.180; or
Noncompetitive negotiation, pursuant to KRS 45A.095; or
Small purchase procedures, pursuant to KRS 45A.100.
law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 16, effective January 1, 1979.
